thread.title: customer Service has been improved alot - Review
thread.title_full: customer Service has been improved alot - Review of W New York - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Manpreet K
title: customer Service has been improved alot - Review
text:
Nice Room, Nice View, Nice Front desk staff.
Due to our high disappointment at Le parker meridian, we checked out from there and same day checked in to W times square.
I must say there are very few hotels at times square which not only commits but also delivers Excellent customer service and W times square is one of those.
I am definitely returning to this hotel
